mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${database.schema}RID (TX_INTESTATARIO, CD_FISC, ID_STATO_RID, NR_CIVICO, CD_NAZIONE, NR_CIN_EUROPEO, CD_ABI, CD_CAB, NR_CIN, NR_CONTO, TX_NOTE, CD_IBAN, ID_OPERAZIONE) VALUES (#{intestatarioRid}, #{cdFiscale}, #{tipoStatoRid}, #{numeroCivico}, #{paese}, #{cin}, #{abi}, #{cab}, #{cinAbi}, #{numeroCC}, #{note}, upper(concat(#{paese},#{cin},#{cinAbi},lpad(#{abi},5,'0'),lpad(#{cab},5,'0'),lpad(replace(#{numeroCC},'.',''),12,'0'))), #{operazione.idOperazione})
mapper.update: UPDATE ${database.schema}RID SET TX_INTESTATARIO = #{intestatarioRid}, CD_FISC = #{cdFiscale}, ID_STATO_RID = #{tipoStatoRid}, CD_NAZIONE = #{paese}, NR_CIN_EUROPEO = #{cin}, CD_ABI = #{abi}, CD_CAB = #{cab}, NR_CIN = #{cinAbi}, NR_CONTO = #{numeroCC}, TX_NOTE = #{note}, ID_OPERAZIONE = #{operazione.idOperazione}, cd_iban=upper(concat(#{paese},#{cin},#{cinAbi},lpad(#{abi},5,'0'),lpad(#{cab},5,'0'),lpad(replace(#{numeroCC},'.',''),12,'0'))) WHERE ID_RID=#{nrRid}
mapper.select: select A.TX_NOME as nome,A.ID_ANAGRAFICA as idAnagrafica, A.TX_COGNOME as cognome, A.TX_NOME as nome, R.ID_RID as idRid,R.TX_INTESTATARIO as intestatario from ${database.schema}anagrafica A, ${database.schema}tessera t, ${database.schema}rid R where A.id_anagrafica=t.id_anagrafica and R.id_rid=t.id_rid and A.tx_cognome=#{cognome} group by A.TX_NOME, A.ID_ANAGRAFICA , A.TX_COGNOME, A.TX_NOME, R.ID_RID ,R.TX_INTESTATARIO
select TS.ID_STATO_RID as idStatoRid, TS.DS_STATO_RID as dsStatoRid from ${database.schema}tipo_stato_rid TS

SELECT ID_RID AS nrRid, upper(TX_INTESTATARIO) as intestatarioRid, upper(CD_FISC) as cdFiscale, ID_STATO_RID as tipoStatoRid,
upper(CD_NAZIONE) as paese, NR_CIN_EUROPEO cin, CD_ABI abi, CD_CAB as cab, NR_CIN as cinAbi, upper(NR_CONTO) as numeroCC, TX_NOTE as note
FROM ${database.schema}RID
where RID.id_stato_rid=4

#{item}
